# setBorderColor(_:for:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the border color of the specified edge of the text block.

## Declaration

```swift
func setBorderColor(_ color: NSColor?, for edge: NSRectEdge)
```

## Parameters

- **color**: The new color.
- **edge**: The edge whose color is to be set.

## Discussion

This setting has no visible effect unless the border width is larger than the default, which is 0.

## Related Documentation

- **setWidth(_:type:for:)**: Sets the width of all edges of a specified layer of the text block.

## Working with color

- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the text block.
- **setBorderColor(_:)**: Sets the color of all borders of the text block.
- **borderColor(for:)**: Returns the border color of the specified text block edge.
